001package com.github.aecsocket.demeter.paper.util;
002
003public class GrassColors extends ImageColors {
004    public static final int DEFAULT_COLOR = 0x00ff01;
005
006    public GrassColors(int width, int height, int[] pixels) {
007        super(width, height, pixels);
008    }
009
010    public GrassColors(ImageColors o) {
011        super(o);
012    }
013
014    @Override
015    public int get(double temp, double humid) {
016        int idx = index(temp, humid);
017        return idx > pixels.length ? DEFAULT_COLOR : pixels[idx];
018    }
019}
